abstract: Mexican native Juan Francisco Lopez-Sanchez will stand trial in July murder of Kate Steinle in San Francisco; has been deported five times, and his actions are now igniting immigration debate.
lead_paragraph: A man at the center of the national immigration debate must stand trial on a murder charge in the shooting of a San Francisco woman.

headline.main: California: Murder Trial Set for Man at Center of Immigration Debate
headline.print_headline: California: Judge Orders a Murder Trial

snippet: A man at the center of the national immigration debate must stand trial on a murder charge in the shooting of a San Francisco woman.
